law.catch_line: The Secretary may collect, report, and illustrate the results of any investigation by the Department...

text.section: The Secretary may collect, report, and illustrate the results of any investigation by the Department that relates to hazardous material.

The Secretary may:
Publish summaries of judgments, decrees, or court orders issued under this subtitle; and
If there is an imminent danger to public health, publish information about any hazardous material.
